World.Description: Integer from 1 to 8 representing the World number.

Level.Description: Integer from 1 to 3 representing the Level number within a World.

Scene.Description: Integer ID uniquely identifying a scene within a Worldâ€“Level.

x Hi (entry).Description: High-byte (or partial) coordinate for the entry X position.

x Lo (entry).Description: Low-byte (or partial) coordinate for the entry X position.

x Hi (exit).Description: High-byte (or partial) coordinate for the exit X position.

x Lo (exit).Description: Low-byte (or partial) coordinate for the exit X position.

Entry point.Description: Full X position marking the beginning of the scene.

Exit point.Description: Full X position marking the end of the scene.

Layout.Description: Optional placeholder or descriptive label for a scene's layout.

Enemy.Description: Indicates presence or absence of a single enemy in this scene.

Roof.Description: Enemies placed under a hanging platform (Mario can bounce on the ceiling).

Gap.Description: Indicates a single gap in the ground or platform.

Multiple gaps.Description: Indicates more than one gap with fixed platforms in between.

Variable gaps.Description: Indicates variable gap and platform widths.

Gap enemy.Description: Indicates enemies in the air above gaps.

Pillar gap.Description: Indicates a pillar (pipe or blocks) placed on platforms between gaps.

Valley.Description: A valley created by stacked blocks/pipes (no Piranha plants).

Pipe valley.Description: A valley with pipes that contain Piranha plants.

Roof valley.Description: A valley with enemies and a roof (ceiling bounce).

2-Path.Description: A scene offering two possible paths (1 hanging platform).

3-Path.Description: A scene offering three possible paths (2 hanging platforms).

Risk/Reward.Description: A multiple-path situation where one path is riskier but has a reward.

Empty stair valley.Description: Valley between a stair up and down without enemies.

Enemy stair valley.Description: Valley between a stair up and down with enemies.

Gap stair valley.Description: Valley between a stair up and down with a gap in the middle.

Reward.Description: Indicates a reward without immediate danger.

Moving platform.Description: Indicates a platform moving vertically or horizontally.

Beginning.Description: Indicates the beginning of a level.

Waterworld.Description: A special hidden zone with underwater gameplay.

Checkpoint.Description: Respawn point after the player reached this position for the first time.
